item.title: Building a world that never sleeps
item.description: Keep it simple for your first game. For quite some time I’ve been pondering a new multiplayer server technology and netcode architecture. After spending 15+ years in the gaming industry I know this is no small task - there’s a graveyard of game studios and aspirational game devs alike who have tried and failed to write good netcode. In fact, I was at a startup that was plagued with network issues that they spent loads of money and manpower (myself included) to figure it out.
